name: Stella Nova
description:
Created for KJam#1. Use WASD or arrow keys for movement. Left mouse button shoots.

There are five different items that spawn randomly from enemies: three weapons, HP, and ammunition.

All graphics were created by me during the jam. Sounds were purchased from Glitchmachines. You can view their legal page here. I modified most of the sounds in Reaper using various tools such as the Iris 2 synth to better suit the gameplay. Music was composed by me for this game!
